name: photos-oklm
description: difficile Ã  dire, en tout cas on traite des photos !
author: Pierre Duchateau <pad@dabla.com>

scripts.dev-db: docker compose down --remove-orphans && docker compose up -d
scripts.test-db: export NODE_ENV=test && export COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=photos_oklm_tests && docker compose down --remove-orphans && docker compose -f ./docker-compose-integration.yml up -d && until docker exec photos_oklm_db_tests pg_isready -U test -d photos_oklm_test; do sleep 1; done
